properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on the iPhone
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on the iPhone
section.p: With the JamVM port of saurik.com, Concierge runs out of the box. Unfortunately, currently only headless because this build of JamVM does not come with an AWT peer.
